title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. VI, subch. F, art. 5, pt. 973 - Abandonment Of Railroad Transportation Property
content:

State Regulations
§ 973.1 - Notification of intent to discontinue railroad service
§ 973.2 - Notification of intent to dispose of abandoned property
§ 973.3 - Review of notification
§ 973.4 - Notification of interest in acquisition by others
§ 973.5 - Notification of determination by Department of Transportation
§ 973.6 - Exercise of preferential right or release

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. VI, subch. F, art. 5, pt. 973

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
